body.p:
The Site Dashboard page provides a convenient landing page for each particular site configuration. The page includes three panes:
Site Details Pane - This pane includes general information about the particular site such as the number of members, a chart with the number and types of comments added by your community, information about the number of page views received, the number of positive and negative page ratings, and AI Assistant statistics (the number of Sessions, Users, and Threads). There are various components within the pane that you can either hover over to see more information or click to navigate to the relevant page.
Versions Pane - This pane contains details about the versions configured for the site, including information about whether or not the particular version has content indexing, semantic search, AI Assistant, and AI-enhanced search summary enabled and whether or not the version has been installed.
Activity Stream Pane - This pane displays the activity for the particular site, including information about the person who made the change and details about each activity.
